thread.section_title: Kimpton Muse Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: What's not to love?
thread.title_full: What's not to love? - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah C
title: What's not to love?
text:
Background, I'm a long time Kimptonite. I've been in Kimptons all around the US, from SF to DC, LA, OH, UT, WA, OR, FL, PA etc. I know the company is changing but overall I'm a huge fan of the brand.
This was my first time at the Muse, and I really liked it. It's classic Kimpton...clean, modern, well-appointed. Not kitschy nor pretentious. The staff was professional and warm. The night auditor Tony was superb, a real professional.
I only stayed one night so I didn't get to check out the restaurant, gym etc but in terms of the room (double queen) and staff I can't think of anything I'd change. Except maybe the $10 Fred water but it's NYC right? Besides, the raid the mini bar card was $15.
